body:
# You have added 2-step verification

Form: [% service#name %]

You have [% service#dataRetentionDuration %] days to complete and submit your form.

If you have not submitted your form by {meta@expires} your work will be deleted for your security.

## Return and complete your form

Use this link to return to your form:

[Return to form]([% fqdn:return.start %])

[% email.auto-generated %]
subject: [% service#name %]: 2-step verification added
